page.title: 12'MUCHTY BY_PASS cont.
page.content: When the by_pass is completed in the late 1980's it will bring certain advantages to the local community but also certain disadvantages: {Advantages:_ 1.A reduction in air and noise pollution from through traffic. 2.Windows of the houses close to the road will no longer rattle as heavy goods vehicles pass by. 3.It will be safer for people, both young and old to cross the road. {Disadvantages:_ 1.Probable loss of some trade by the petrol filling station and local shops. 2.Loss of good flat arable farmland. 3.Field sizes and shapes will be altered and some sections of land will be uneconomic to work. 4.'Muchty green, a place often used for Festival gatherings_Destoyed!
